resources.string: Download of %1$s is pending. Tap for more information.
%1$s is downloaded. Tap for more actions.
%1$s is being downloaded. Tap for more actions.
"To continue, add the account '%1$s' to this device."
Do you want to begin playback? This rental will expire %1$d days after you start watching it.
Do you want to begin playback? This rental will expire %1$d hours after you start watching it.
The code you entered has already been redeemed.
The code you entered is expired.
The code you entered is not available in your country.
Daily redemption cap exceeded. Please try again later.
The code you entered is invalid.
You can apply your reward at checkout.
You can see your reward under \"My Account\" in the Play Store app.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
The microphone is used for a few seconds to receive a code sent from a nearby device.
"Tell us what you like. It'll help us give you better recommendations. When finished, tap the %1$s button at the bottom right of the screen."
%1$s is in your watchlist. Tap to remove.
Set limits on what you can watch in the Play Movies & TV app.

%1$s

This movie will no longer appear on this device. You may search for it in the Play Store and open it again at any time.

%1$s

This show will no longer appear on this device. You may search for it in the Play Store and open it again at any time.
You can play your content on supported devices
"We'll notify you when movies in your watchlist become available"
This season is not currently available
Parental controls restrict purchasing this item.
Refunds are subjected to Google Play Refund Policy
You can connect one Google account at a time and switch accounts once every 6 months.
You can now dismiss recommendations by swiping away cards. Try it now!
Your %1$s and Disney Movies Anywhere accounts are now disconnected.

%1$s is linked to your Disney Movies Anywhere account. Continue to allow Google to share information about your eligible purchases and use of Disney content with Disney, who may share it with other digital distributors linked to your Disney Movies Anywhere account?
Depending on your data plan, downloading videos when not connected to Wi-Fi may result in additional charges.
"You won't be able to watch this episode on your device unless you're online."
"You won't be able to watch this movie on your device unless you're online."
You can change this any time in Play Movies settings.
You can change this any time in Play Movies & TV settings.
Your video could not be downloaded
\"%1$s\" will be downloaded when you have a network connection.
\"%1$s\" will be downloaded when you have a Wi-Fi connection.
Your videos are now being downloaded
To seek precisely, drag or swipe here
There is no web browser available.
Playback stopped because you are playing too many videos belonging to the same account.
Playback stopped because too many shared videos are playing at the same time.
"Premium content can't be played on this screen because it is not secure."
"Oops, we've run out of downloaded video to play. Reconnect to finish downloading or playing this video."
File not found. Please remove this video, or reinsert the storage onto which it was downloaded.
More of this video needs to download before it can start playing.
"Couldn't fetch license (error 16). If the problem persists, try restarting your device."
"Can't fetch license (error %1$d). Try downloading this video again."
"Can't fetch license (error %1$d). To troubleshoot the problem, click Get Help."
"Can't fetch license (error %1$d). There seems to be an issue with this connection to the Internet. Try a different connection."
"Can't fetch license (error %1$d). If the problem persists, try restarting your device or switching to a different connection."
There was an error. If the problem persists, try restarting your device.
There was a problem with the network (error %1$s). To troubleshoot the problem, click Get Help.
The operating system on your HTC M8 is incompatible with Play Movies and needs to be upgraded (error -38). Please contact HTC about upgrading.
"Couldn't fetch license. If the problem persists, try downloading the video again."
Please install external storage to continue.
Storage cannot be read because it is shared with an external device.
There was a problem with the network.
Unfortunately, the Internet connection isnâ€™t sufficient right now to play this video. Try again later.

"This video won't start because the license to play it offline needs to be renewed. Connect to the Internet, open Play Movies & TV, and the renewal happens automatically. It's a good idea to connect at least once a month."
Your device does not have an application installed for searching the web.
Play Store is being updated. Wait a moment, then try again.
Play Store is not available. You can still purchase content at play.google.com.
This pre-order video has not been released yet.
To stream this video to the selected screen, you first need to remove it from this device.
This video has been downloaded to the maximum number of devices. To play it here, remove it from another device.
Your purchase is still pending. Wait a moment, then try again.
"To connect to this screen, update the screen's software."
To connect to this screen, update your Play Movies app.
There was an error talking to \"%1$s\".
"Couldn't acquire license to play video on \"%1$s\"."
This rental has been downloaded to another device. To play it here, remove it from the other device.
There was a problem with the network response.
"Sorry, you can't play this video because it's rated %1$s."
"Sorry, you can't play this video because it's not rated."
Play Movies & TV is temporarily unavailable [%1$d].
Play Movies & TV is temporarily unavailable.
Playback stopped because a family member is playing this video on another device.
Playback stopped because you began playing this video on another device.
"Due to unusual account activity, this video isn't available right now."
"Can't update your %1$s library. Try closing this screen and then reopening it."
Content eligible for Family Library if purchased with select payment methods. Rentals are not eligible.
Content not eligible for Family Library.
"Your family payment method is invalid. You can't add new purchases to Family Library until you update this payment method."
"Your family payment method is invalid. You can't add new purchases to Family Library until your family manager fixes the problem."
Some content is not eligible for Family Library.
Movies and shows in your library
To watch videos offline, download them first
Expires in less than an hour

"Google Play Movies allows you to watch movies purchased or rented on Google Play. Watch your favorite movies instantly on your Android phone or tablet, or on any HDTV using Chromecast. You can also download and watch from anywhere, even when you're not connected."

"Google Play Movies & TV allows you to watch movies and TV shows purchased or rented on Google Play. Watch your favorite movies and shows instantly on your Android phone or tablet, or on any HDTV using Chromecast. You can also download and watch from anywhere, even when you're not connected."
Watch movies purchased on Google Play.
Watch movies and TV shows purchased on Google Play.
To unpin this screen, touch and hold Back and Overview at the same time.
Log in to Play Movies on device
New season now available on Google Play
Now available to buy or rent
Now available to buy or rent on Play
Now available to buy on Play
Now available to pre-order on Play
Now available to rent on Play
Buy or rent movies and TV shows, then watch them on your TV, smartphone, tablet, or laptop
Buy or rent movies, then watch them on your TV, smartphone, tablet, or laptop
Watch the newest releases on all your devices
Sign in to a set-top box or smart TV
Please update this application to the latest version.
A network connection is required for this download to continue.
This download is queued and will be started shortly.
External storage must be installed for this download to continue.
This download is paused because a video is currently being streamed.
A Wi-Fi connection is required for this download to continue.
There was a problem with the video you downloaded. To watch it offline, please download it again.
"Couldn't fetch license (error 16). If the problem persists, try restarting your device."
Not enough free space to download this video.
Not enough free space to download this video. It needs %s.
This video has been downloaded to the maximum number of devices. To download it here, remove it from another device.
Rentals may be downloaded to only one device at a time. To download your rental here, remove it from your other device.
"This video isn't available in your country."
On any device, up to 3 accounts may have downloaded videos at the same time. To download this video here, remove all of the downloads from another account.
Your account has been used to download videos onto too many devices.
Purchases can be downloaded to up to 5 devices at the same time. To download this video here, remove all downloads from another device.
Your account has been used to download videos onto too many devices.
"The format of this video isn't supported."
Restrict content in the Play Movies app
Automatically play the next episode in your library
Show information about the actors and songs featured at the current position in the video
SD plays more reliably on some devices. You can still Cast and stream to your TV in HD.
Free up space and view downloads in progress
Limits quality to SD when streaming over a mobile network (uses less data)
When a new episode or season of a show that you own becomes available
When content from your watchlist becomes available or drops in price
License details for open source software and fonts
When your rewards are about to expire
Set system-wide preferences for closed captions
Play a short demonstration of surround sound
Activate surround sound, use 5.1 soundtrack when available
Displays a warning before streaming over a mobile network
Poor connection (error %1$d). There seems to be an issue with this connection to the Internet. Try a different connection.
There was a problem while playing
There was a problem playing the video
There was a problem while playing [%1$d]
There was a problem playing the video (error %1$d)
There was a problem while playing [%1$d]. If the problem persists, try restarting your device.
There was a problem playing the video (error %1$d). Try playing the video again or restarting your device.
"It'll help us give you better recommendations"
Based on what you said you liked, we pulled together some recommendations
Recommendations get better and better the more you tell us about movies you like
Rental Period: Start within %1$d days, finish within %2$d days
Start within %1$d days, finish within %2$d days
Rental Period: Start within %1$d days, finish within %2$d hours
Start within %1$d days, finish within %2$d hours
Your reward is about to expire
Make sure your TV is not muted so it can send the code
"You've added a movie that's part of a purchased bundle to the Family Library. This will automatically add all movies from [%1$s] to the Family Library."
"You've added an episode that's part of a purchased season to the Family Library. This will automatically add all episodes from [%1$s] to the Family Library."
%1$s could not be added to Family Library
"By adding a show to Family Library, you'll add all eligible seasons and episodes of the show."
"You own some episodes of this show that aren't currently in Family Library. Do you want to add them?"
"You've exceeded the maximum number of devices on which this video can be streamed within 24 hours."
Not enough bandwidth to stream in high quality. Switching to normal quality.
Not enough bandwidth to stream in HD. Switching to normal quality.
Explore trailers for new movie releases offered by %1$s
"You've removed a movie that's part of a purchased bundle from the Family Library. This will automatically remove all movies from [%1$s] from the Family Library."
"You've removed an episode that's part of a purchased season from the Family Library. This will automatically remove all episodes from [%1$s] from the Family Library."
%1$s could not be removed from Family Library
"This video cannot be played in VR due to studio's content restriction policy."
Play Movies VR is currently not available in your country.
"Discover movies and TV shows on the Explore screen. Then come back here to your library to see everything you've bought or rented."
To watch videos offline, download them first.
No account found. Please exit VR and login into Play Movies app to continue.
"You're offline. You can watch any downloaded videos in your library."
Drag to move screen. Swipe up/down to resize it.
Terms of service have changed. You need to exit VR and accept the terms in Play Store.
Play Movies is not yet available in your country.
Tap the Cast icon above to enjoy your movies on the big screen.
Tap the Cast icon above to enjoy your movies and TV shows on the big screen.
Enjoy the latest offer from Google Play
With Google Play Family Library, you can purchase and share movies, games, and more with up to 5 additional family members.
Watch %1$s at no cost to you, and find more movies in the Play store.
Find a great movie in the Play Store, then kick back and enjoy with the %1$s app.
Find a great movie or TV show in the Play Store, then kick back and enjoy with the %1$s app.
Curious about an actor or soundtrack in a movie? Some movies have info cards - just pause the movie to see them.
Find a great movie in the Play Store, then kick back and enjoy with the %1$s app.
Get started with a free movie from the Play Store, then watch instantly with the %1$s app.
Find a great TV show in the Play Store, then kick back and enjoy with the %1$s app.
Get started with a free episode from the Play Store, then watch instantly with the %1$s app.
To save movies to watch later, tap Add to watchlist
To save movies or TV shows to watch later, tap Add to watchlist
"Check that your device's date and time are correct, and then try again."
Please update this application to the latest version. You can do this by visiting the Play Store.
"Premium content isn't available because the system software installed on your device is too old. Please update it to the latest version."
Oops. You need the Play Store to install Chrome.
Oops. You need a web browser to view this content.
